Package org.thewhitemage13.service

Class CommentStatisticServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.service.CommentStatisticServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommentStatisticServiceInterface
@Service @Transactional public class CommentStatisticServiceImpl extends Object implements CommentStatisticServiceInterface
Service implementation for managing CommentStatistic entities.

This service provides methods to create, delete, retrieve, and show comment statistics for a given date. It interacts with the CommentStatisticRepository to perform CRUD operations on the comment statistics.

Key Features:

  • Creates a new comment statistic or updates the existing one for the current date.
  • Deletes the comment statistic or updates it based on deleted comments.
  • Fetches all comment statistics or the statistic for a specific date.
  • Deletes a comment statistic by a specific date.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • createCommentStatistic

      public void createCommentStatistic()
      Creates or updates the comment statistic for the current date.

      If no statistics exist for the current date, a new entry is created. If statistics already exist, the number of created comments is incremented.

      Specified by:
      createCommentStatistic in interface CommentStatisticServiceInterface

    • deleteCommentStatistic

      public void deleteCommentStatistic()
      Deletes or updates the comment statistic for the current date when a comment is deleted.

      If no statistics exist for the current date, a new entry is created. If statistics already exist, the number of created and deleted comments is updated accordingly.

      Specified by:
      deleteCommentStatistic in interface CommentStatisticServiceInterface

    • showAllStatistics

      public List<CommentStatistic> showAllStatistics()
      Retrieves all the comment statistics.
      Specified by:
      showAllStatistics in interface CommentStatisticServiceInterface
      Returns:
      a list of all CommentStatistic entities

    • showStatisticsByDate

      public CommentStatistic showStatisticsByDate(LocalDate date)
      Retrieves the comment statistic for a specific date.

      If no statistic exists for the given date, a StatisticNotFoundException is thrown.

      Specified by:
      showStatisticsByDate in interface CommentStatisticServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      date - the date for which to retrieve the comment statistic
      Returns:
      the CommentStatistic for the specified date
      Throws:
      StatisticNotFoundException - if no statistic is found for the given date

    • deleteStatisticByDate

      public void deleteStatisticByDate(LocalDate date)
      Deletes the comment statistic for a specific date.

      This method will remove the comment statistic entry from the repository for the given date.

      Specified by:
      deleteStatisticByDate in interface CommentStatisticServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      date - the date for which to delete the comment statistic
